price: Sie bieten Allah an jenem Tag Ergebenheit an, und es ist ihnen entschwunden, was sie zu ersinnen pflegten.
arabic: وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wa-alqaw ilā al-lahi yawma-idhin al-salama waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
